table.column: , 152681 *, After all functions are compiled and linked into a single design
, , After user unroll and inline pragmas are applied
(1) unroll, 745248 *, user unroll pragmas are applied
(2) simplification, 290156 *, simplification of applied user unroll pragmas
(3) inline, 286401 *, user inline pragmas are applied
(4) simplification, 285921 *, simplification of applied user inline pragmas
, , After user array partition and struct aggregate/disaggregate pragmas are applied
(1) array partition, 249767 *, user array partition pragmas are applied
(2) simplification, 231317 *, simplification of applied user array partition & struct aggregate/disaggregate pragmas
(3) aggregate/disaggregate , 231317 *, user struct aggregate/disaggregate pragmas are applied
(4) array reshape, 239573 *, apply array reshape pragmas
(5) access patterns, 227220 *, array access pattern optmizations
, , After transformations are applied to meet performance pragma targets
(1) loop simplification, 218970 *, loop and instruction simplification
(2) parallelization, 216384 *, loops are unrolled or pipelined to meet performance targets
(3) array partition, 216384 *, arrays are partitioned to meet performance targets
(4) simplification, 201077 *, simplification of design after performance transformations
, , After hardware transfomations
(1) lowering, 201088 *, initial conversion to HW specific instructions
(2) optimizations, 201097 *, high level synthesis optimizations
